Package tanks.pathfinding

Class PathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • tanks.pathfinding.PathFinder
  • public class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a PathFinder for a Level

      The Level the path finding will take place in

      Determine if a path cuts a corner

      Generates a path to a destination
      private java.util.ArrayList<Node> getNeighbors​(Node current, Node target)
      Gets the neighbors of a given Node This does not include neighbors that are pushed up against Walls, unless the Node is very near the beginning or end of the path
      private int getNewG​(Node current, Node parent)
      Calculates the g of a Node based on the parent
      private boolean isPushedUpAgainstWall​(int x, int y)
      Determines if a position is pushed up against a wall This is only the case if it is a flat wall with no other walls around
      private void resetNodes()
      Resets all nodes This is when a new path is starting its generation

        public java.util.ArrayList<Node> generatePath​(int[] destination)
        Generates a path to a destination
        Parameters:
        destination - the destination of the path
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Nodes that contains each Node in the path

        private int getNewG​(Node current,

        Calculates the g of a Node based on the parent
        Parameters:
        current - the Node to calculate for
        parent - the Parent of that Node
        Returns:
        the new g value

      • getNeighbors

        private java.util.ArrayList<Node> getNeighbors​(Node current,
                                               Node target)
        Gets the neighbors of a given Node This does not include neighbors that are pushed up against Walls, unless the Node is very near the beginning or end of the path
        Parameters:
        current - the Node to get the neighbors of
        target - the target Node for the path
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Nodes of all neighbors

      • isPushedUpAgainstWall

        private boolean isPushedUpAgainstWall​(int x,
                                      int y)
        Determines if a position is pushed up against a wall This is only the case if it is a flat wall with no other walls around
        Parameters:
        x - the x position
        y - the y position
        Returns:
        a boolean representing if the position is pushed up against a Wall

      • cutsCorner

        private boolean cutsCorner​(int x,
                           int xOff,
                           int y,
                           int yOff)
        Determine if a path cuts a corner
        Parameters:
        x - the current x position
        xOff - the next x position
        y - the current y position
        yOff - the next y position
        Returns:
        a boolean representing if the path cuts a corner

      • resetNodes

        private void resetNodes()
        Resets all nodes This is when a new path is starting its generation
